s.text: New Yorkers won't wait for much, but they apparently will wait for Geraldine Ferraro.
New York political bosses and big donors are biding their time waiting for her announcement.
New Yorkers won't wait for much, but they apparently will wait for Geraldine Ferraro.
As an individual, rather than a symbol, she's wonderfully engaging--charming, tough, smart, funny, thoughtful.
As an individual, rather than a symbol, she's wonderfully engaging--charming, tough, smart, funny, thoughtful.
Her skills as an operator served her own career: When she arrived in Congress in 1979, she quickly inserted herself under the wing of House Speaker Tip O'Neill.
Her skills as an operator served her own career: When she arrived in Congress in 1979, she quickly inserted herself under the wing of House Speaker Tip O'Neill.

Her skills as an operator served her own career: When she arrived in Congress in 1979, she quickly inserted herself under the wing of House Speaker Tip O'Neill.
(Her path to Washington was cleared by the fact that her cousin Nicholas Ferraro was the Queens district attorney and a political player.)
(Her path to Washington was cleared by the fact that her cousin Nicholas Ferraro was the Queens district attorney and a political player.)
It's not likely to be an easy primary.
This year is her last chance at Al: "It's either do it now, or don't do it at all."
